name: 勞維俊
objective: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
schedule:
Course Aims:
Preparing participants’ necessary skills in writing their senior project, this course is designed to train their abilities to describe cultural texts, to critically analyze them, and to present ideas clearly and pervasively. Participants will be exposed to cultural products including literature, films, paintings, music, performances, architecture and so on, according what is available and accessible.

Course Outline:

Week 1: Introduction 

Week 2: On paintings

Week 3: No class (International conference) 

Week 4: On paintings

Week 5-6: (Mid-term essay draft due)

Week 7: No class (university holiday)

Week 8: Style: Lessons 5

Week 9: Mid-term essay due 

Week 10-11: On literature

Week 13: Style: Lessons 6

Week 14: Forgotten Books Conference preparation

Week 15: Style: Lessons 7

Week 16: Presentation weeks (Final essay draft due)

Week 17: Presentation weeks

Week 18: Final essay due

Teaching Approach:

The students are expected to have read the required primary texts before the lecture. Classes will be in the form of lectures and workshops. Assessments include tutorial participations, presentation, mid-term and final essays.
